snippet.title: CRUFT Demo Coming Soon
snippet.description:
We're making a game! CRUFT is a cozy crafting game where everything you make makes a bit of a mess. Bootstrap your way to fame and fortune one step at a time. Sell items at the market, or find a great deal through one of your contacts.

Keep an eye out for the demo during Steam Next Fest!
